description: SINGAPORE - There are times when a less pricey, less equipped and less powerful car outshines its more illustrious sibling. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Car review: Polestar 2 Standard Range Single Motor shows less is definitely more
title_page: Car review: Polestar 2 Standard Range Single Motor shows less is definitely more | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - There are times when a less pricey, less equipped and less powerful car outshines its more illustrious sibling.
The Polestar 2 Standard Range Single Motor (SRSM) is one of them.
